General.Name: The Ramco Cements Limited
General.Description: The Ramco Cements Limited manufactures and sells cement, ready mix concrete, and dry mortar products in India. It offers formulated blended and ordinary Portland cements; ready mix concrete; and dry mortar products, including tile fix, super plaster, eco plast, plastering compound, super fine cement-based putty, block fix mortar, and tile grout under the RAMCO brand. The company also offers construction solutions for housing projects, apartments/institutions, public infrastructure projects, and industrial projects; and technical assistance and after sales support to builders. In addition, it is involved in the generation and sale of electricity from windmills and thermal power plants. The Ramco Cements Limited also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Madras Cements Ltd. and changed its name to The Ramco Cements Limited in July 2013. The Ramco Cements Limited was incorporated in 1957 and is headquartered in Chennai, India.
